rules.install:
export PATH="$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/.mybin:$PATH" cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR"
install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/python2" install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/python3"
bh_python_install --py2 --install "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/python2" bh_python_install --py3 --install "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/python3"
cd "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" find . -name "*.egg-info" -prune -exec rm -fr '{}' ';'
